title: Ryan Wilson on best under 25 players, top Comeback POY choices (Football 07/23)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson to break down the latest NFL news, including Carson Wentz, Deshaun Watson and Andrew Luck being given the green light to get on the field for training camp, which leads the guys into a discussion of the best Comeback Player of the Year candidates. They also talk about Saquon Barkley signing his rookie contract, the latest on the national anthem situation, James Harrison being up in the Patriots business, the sad passing of Tony Sparano and then they look at Will's list of best players under the age of 25.
